application

Class RootSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.RootSceneController

  • class RootSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
    The root scene is the main frame of the GUI. It handles the overall layout of the program. This is where more "global" changes should take place and should be the highest point of abstraction to transfer logic.
